remarks: Structure slot extractors cannot distinguish between proper classes and ` (/) ` , so they can be protected using the identity function. (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 21-Mar-2015.)
statement:
strfvi.e $e |- E = Slot N $.
strfvi.x $e |- X = ( E ` S ) $.
strfvi $p |- X = ( E ` ( _I ` S ) ) $.
